item.title: About me!
item.description: I’m an electronics and communication engineer graduated from Bangalore Institute of Technology in 2018. I worked as Hardware Design Engineer at Robert Bosch, Bangalore. Currently I’m working as a Senior Hardware Engineer for XR products at Qualcomm, Bangalore
